bibl.title: New Wooden Labels from Various Collections.
bibl.note: 25 wooden tablets. Part of a wider project on mummy labels, in collaboration with the Oriental Institute, University of Chicago, which will produce an online database (MLD). - 1. Abbey of Montserrat, the Roca-Puig collection [No. 1 = T. Monts. Roca Inv. 1302]. - 2. The Forrer collection [Nos 2-4 = T. Coll. privées: T. Forrer sans Nos d'Inv., presented as objects 2, 5 and 8 in: Robert Forrer, Reallexikon der prähistorischen, klassischen und frühchristlichen Altertümer (Berlin - Stuttgart, 1907), p. 11, pl. 4]. - 3. The Leiden National Museum of Antiquities [Nos 5-11 = T. Leid. Inv. F 1942/12.8; 12.10; 12.11; 12.12; 12.13; 12.15; 12.1 (Demotic side to be published by François Gaudard)]. - 4. The Oriental Museum, Durham, UK [Nos 12-16 = T. Durham Oriental Mus. Inv. 1971.193; EG 1271 (9393); 1274 (Wel 137); 1275; 1279 (1260)]. - 5. The Barakat Gallery [Nos 17-24 = T. Coll. privées: ex T. Michaelides Inv. LO.1181; 1184; 1186; 1189; 1192; 1194; 1195; FF.116]. - 4 [sic, read 6]. James Madison University (Harrisonburg, VA) [No. 25 = T. Harrisonburg James Madison Univ. Inv. 76.1.494].
bibl.seg: 143.12 / 143.4 T. Leid. Inv. F 1942/12.1 143.13 / 143.4 T. Coll. privées: T. Forrer sans No. d'Inv. 143.4 T. Coll. privées: T. Forrer sans No. d'Inv. T. Coll. privées: ex T. Michaelides Inv. LO.1181; 1184; 1186; 1189; 1192; 1194; 1195; FF.116 T. Durham Oriental Mus. Inv. 1971.193; EG 1271 (9393); 1274 (Wel 137); 1275; 1279 (1260) T. Harrisonburg James Madison Univ. Inv. 76.1.494 T. Leid. Inv. F 1942/12.8; 12.10; 12.11; 12.12; 12.13; 12.15 T. Monts. Roca Inv. 1302
Sofía Torallas Tovar & Klaas A. Worp, New Wooden Labels from Various Collections.

25 wooden tablets. Part of a wider project on mummy labels, in collaboration with the Oriental Institute, University of Chicago, which will produce an online database (MLD). - 1. Abbey of Montserrat, the Roca-Puig collection [No. 1 = T. Monts. Roca Inv. 1302]. - 2. The Forrer collection [Nos 2-4 = T. Coll. privées: T. Forrer sans Nos d'Inv., presented as objects 2, 5 and 8 in: Robert Forrer, Reallexikon der prähistorischen, klassischen und frühchristlichen Altertümer (Berlin - Stuttgart, 1907), p. 11, pl. 4]. - 3. The Leiden National Museum of Antiquities [Nos 5-11 = T. Leid. Inv. F 1942/12.8; 12.10; 12.11; 12.12; 12.13; 12.15; 12.1 (Demotic side to be published by François Gaudard)]. - 4. The Oriental Museum, Durham, UK [Nos 12-16 = T. Durham Oriental Mus. Inv. 1971.193; EG 1271 (9393); 1274 (Wel 137); 1275; 1279 (1260)]. - 5. The Barakat Gallery [Nos 17-24 = T. Coll. privées: ex T. Michaelides Inv. LO.1181; 1184; 1186; 1189; 1192; 1194; 1195; FF.116]. - 4 [sic, read 6]. James Madison University (Harrisonburg, VA) [No. 25 = T. Harrisonburg James Madison Univ. Inv. 76.1.494].
